articles.summary: AI PCs with NPUs deliver predictive power, fix issues before you notice them, cut costs and boost enterprise productivity, according to the company.   It is possible to solve problems on AI PCs before they are noticed. It is also possible to fix problems before they occur.

articles.title: AI-influenced shopping boosts online holiday sales, Salesforce data shows
articles.author: Colorado Springs Gazette
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence-powered chatbots helped consumers purchase and return products during the holiday season. This boosted online sales in the United States by nearly 4% year-over-year, according to a report by Salesforce.com. The report was based on a survey of more than 1,000 consumers.

articles.summary: Vladimir Putin has instructed his government to cooperate with China on AI development. He expects a progress report in April on AI research and development in the People's Republic of China and expects a report on the progress in the field of artificial intelligence in the next few months.

articles.title: Fox Cities Chamber: Planning AI Summit in November; now accepting speaker applications
articles.author: Kate Morton
articles.summary: The Fox Cities Chamber is accepting speaker applications for a regional AI Business Summit being planned for Nov. 5, 2025 at the Hilton Paper Valley in Appleton, from 8 AM to 3:30 PM. It is an informational program and all presentations must be educational in nature. The application deadline is February 3, 2025.

articles.title: Sam Altman And OpenAI Are Now Looking Toward Artificial Superintelligence
articles.author: Staff Report
articles.summary: Sam Altman, head of OpenAI, which makes ChatGPT, has written a blog post explaining that his company is now turning its attention to artificial superintelligence (ASI) or just superintelligence. He said OpenAI loves the products it has developed so far, but it wants to unlock a 'glorious future'
